entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening then changing to rain showers before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 3.
